Uses of Class
com.rshepard.atm.Account

    • Uses of Account in com.rshepard.atm

      Methods in com.rshepard.atm that return Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account BankValidation.getAccount(int accountNumber)
      getAccount returns the instance of the current account being used and creates a log entry of the action performed
      Methods in com.rshepard.atm that return types with arguments of type Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Account> BankValidation.getAccounts()
      If debug is true this method is used to pass the accounts to the DebugScreen class to display the information
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Account> BankValidation.getPins()
      If debug is true this method is used to pass the PINs for the dummy accounts to the DebugScreen class to display the information
      Methods in com.rshepard.atm with parameters of type Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Logger.addReceiptTitle(Account account, int transactionNumber)
      Adds a title to the receipt including ATM location, account number, transaction number, and beginning balances for the checking and savings account.
      static void Logger.endReceipt(Account account, java.lang.String messageText)
      Adds the footer to the receipt for transactions that are made by the user including the ending balances after transactions are made.
      Constructor parameters in com.rshepard.atm with type arguments of type Account 
      Constructor and Description
      DebugScreen(java.util.ArrayList<Account> accounts, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Account> pins)
      Constructor initializes the accounts and PINs to be displayed when the ATM boots up
      DebugScreen(java.util.ArrayList<Account> accounts, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Account> pins)
      Constructor initializes the accounts and PINs to be displayed when the ATM boots up
